name: MaulaMole
description:
Maul a Mole ! And go as far as possible.

The higher you lift your maul, the farther you will get (but the harder it will be)

CONTROLS Up/Down, or W/S
Move the Maul
SPACEHit the MoleLeft/Right or A/DMove the MoleRReplay About

All arts and code for this game were made in less than 3h work per person, for the Trijam-80, with the theme "What goes up (must come down)".
